name: Music_3925.wav
keywords: ['meditation music', 'running water sound', 'sound of bells', 'feedback', 'no voices', 'minimal instruments', 'relaxing song']
caption: This song features the sound of running water in the background. The sound of bells is played in the foreground. There is a ringing instrument playing through the song and this produces feedback at the end of the clip. There are no voices in this song. This song is relaxing and can be played for the purpose of religious meditation.
